servinfo.title: Front Strut Assembly Removal and Installation

attention3.ptxt: When servicing component parts of strut assembly, remove strut rod cap and then loosen strut nut a little before removing strut assembly. This will make service work easier. Note that the nut must not be removed at this point.

s1.ptxt: Hoist vehicle, allowing front suspension to hang free.
Remove wheel and disconnect stabilizer joint (1) from strut bracket.
When loosening joint nut, hold stud with hexagon wrench.
Remove brake hose mounting bolt (1) and remove brake hose (2) from bracket.
Disconnect front height sensor (if equipped) from suspension control arm for left side referring to Height Sensor Removal and Installation (If Equipped) .
Remove front wheel speed sensor harness clamp bolt (3) (if equipped) and then detach front speed sensor harness (5) from strut bracket as shown in figure.
Remove strut bracket bolts and nuts (4).

attention3.ptxt: Hold strut by hand so that it will not fall off.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Install strut assembly by reversing removal procedure, noting the following instructions.

item.ptxt: Insert bolts in such direction as shown in figure.
Tighten all fasteners to specified torque.

torqueitem.t-part: Front wheel speed sensor harness clamp bolt

item.ptxt: Lower hoist and vehicle in unloaded condition, tighten strut support nuts (b) to specified torque.

attention2.ptxt: If reuse strut bracket bolt and nut, apply engine oil to thread, bearing and trunk surface.

item.ptxt: Don’t twist brake hose and ABS wheel speed sensor harness (if equipped) when installing them.
Insert strut bracket bolt from vehicle forward.
Tighten wheel nuts to specified torque.
After installation, confirm front wheel alignment and adjust headlight auto leveling system referring to Initialization of Auto Leveling Headlight System .
